subject: Instant Replay (Sports)
Baseball
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Adrian Johnson, the third-base umpire, signaled a foul ball after Carlos Beltran hit a drive down the third-base line that appeared to be fair.
snippet: Adrian Johnson, the third-base umpire, signaled a foul ball after Carlos Beltran hit a drive down the third-base line that appeared to be fair.
